ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T23:28:52 [Issue ID 4000-86715] urn:comicvine:4000-86715 urn:metron:issue/dark-horse-presents-1986-39/ Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:00:53. [Issue ID 47878]
ComicInfo.Summary: Violence awaits Mercy St. Clair, Ron Randall's young 23rd century bounty hunter, as Trekker comes back to the pages of DHP! Mercy returns to crime-ridden New Gelaph, the place where she got her start, with no money, few friends, and plenty of doubts. Maybe this wasn't such a hot career choice after all! Also featured this issue is another fun-filled escapade with Rich Rice's transfer student form the stars, Bob the Alien! Plus more exciting features!
ComicInfo.Title: Schemes; Drelin's Wager
ComicInfo.Writer: Gary Davis,Ron Randall,Rich Rice,Ron Randall,Rich Rice,Gary Davis
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ron Randall,Rich Rice,Gary Davis,Ron Randall,Rich Rice,Gary Davis
ComicInfo.Inker: Ron Randall,Rich Rice,Gary Davis,Ron Randall,Rich Rice,Gary Davis
